body_html:
@velikodniy I should've re-visited this much earlier, but it slipped my queue. The introduction of pos_weight indeed makes it a bit more complicated.

I think we should add that option to BCELoss and BCEWithLogitsLoss directly.

body:
@velikodniy I should've re-visited this much earlier, but it slipped my queue. The introduction of pos_weight indeed makes it a bit more complicated.

I think we should add that option to BCELoss and BCEWithLogitsLoss directly.
